text: "Ballad of a Homeschooled Girl" is a song by American singer-songwriter Olivia Rodrigo for her second studio album, Guts (2023). Rodrigo wrote it with Dan Nigro. ==Awards== Awards and nominations for "Ballad of a Homeschooled Girl" Year Organization Award Result 2024 Grammy Awards Best Rock Song ==References== Category:2023 songs Category:Olivia Rodrigo songs
title: Ballad of a Homeschooled Girl
